abstract: Once a photo is transferred from a smartphone, the user has a number of options for making a copy.
snippet: Once a photo is transferred from a smartphone, the user has a number of options for making a copy.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have a photo on my phone that I want to print out and give to a friend, but how do I get it off my phone? Do I need a special photo printer or can the regular printer I use do it?

headline.main: Printing a Photo From a Phone
headline.print_headline: Printing a Photo From a Phone
